title: Top Boy fans ‘shock’: Netflix releases 'jaw-dropping' final episode
text:
Netflix have cleared up the explosive season three Top Boy finale, which has left fans of the show in complete shock.

Clad in scruffy clothing and begging for a hit on a number of occasions, season three introduced two junkies called Lee and Sarah, who were seen gaining the trust of their dealers.

However, the season's finale showed the duo being unveiled as undercover cops, before Top Boy's official Twitter shared a video of the clues that led to the shock moment - leaving fans in absolute bewilderment.

Twist: Netflix have cleared up the explosive season three Top Boy finale, which has left fans of the show in complete shock

Lee and Sarah appeared to be forging a good relationship with a number of dealers, including Dushane (Ashley Walters) and Sully (Kane Robinson), throughout the season.

However, they suffered a few mishaps along the way, which proved that there was something more to their characters.

On one occasion, Sarah pretends to be drunk after chucking away some alcohol while walking through a council estate.

In another scene, Lee ponders out loud 'how long they have to keep this up for' after being punched in the face.

Plot: Lee and Sarah appeared to be forging a good relationship with a number of dealers, including Dushane (Ashley Walters) and Sully (Kane Robinson), throughout the season

Shocking: However, the season's finale showed the duo being unveiled as undercover cops

'I can't believe it': Fans were left in absolute bewilderment as the ending was explained in further depth

It's only during the final scene, when they are seen sitting in the police station, where viewers realise they are undercover cops hoping to lock away Dushane and Sully.

The official Twitter account for Top Boy then uploaded a five minute long video, in which they properly pointed out the hints that gave away the finale.

Viewers proved to be completely surprised by the series of hints throughout the season, as they offered their thoughts:

'What a twist, quality ending and can't wait for the next series#HurryUpNewSeries.'

'Was shocked, never saw that coming awesome' and 'My jaw hit the floor with this!'

'Yooo this last scene is something else. Who saw this coming?! #TopBoy .'

'Jaw hit the floor': Viewers proved to be completely surprised by the series of hints throughout the season

'Was a brilliant twist, don't judge a book by its cover, you never know....Dushanes face if they both arrest him in the next series!!'

'Just finished top boy the maddest ending #TopBoy #TopBoyNetflix.'

'Omggggggggggggg. What a surprise!!!! #TopBoy was brilliant!!!! I’m in shock. Ahhhhh. I can’t believe it!!!!'

'Last episode of #TopBoy had my emotions all over the oche! Tears to absolute shock!! Whole series has been a masterpiece to be fair, best watch in a long while.'

Meanwhile, executive producer Drake revealed he was inspired to work on the series after stumbling across the show in 2017.

The chart-topping artist told the Hollywood Reporter at the time: 'That human element drew me in.

'I started just looking them up. Like, who are these people? Are these actors I should know? Are they just famous over there? I remember I hit Future, and I was just like, "This show is incredible."'

Grime artist Kano - real name Kane Robinson - revealed the global superstar brought 'good energy' to the third series of the show.

He said at the Edinburgh TV Festival in August: 'I met Drake at the beginning when we was in discussions. When the Netflix deal came about, me and Ashley and him sat down and spoke.

'Drake is aware of the talk, you know what I mean, the stuff going on – that he is jumping on the hype. He was like: “Look, I’m a fan of the show and I just wanted to see if there was any way I could help in any way and bring this back.

‘”You guys need to create the show just the same way for the same reason that I ended up loving it.”’
